text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires listing at least three concrete contractual levers the author can negotiate. The candidate answer provides a detailed table listing ten distinct negotiation levers, including: Royalty rate, Advance on royalties, Price-floor clause, Revenue-share on discounts, Territorial scope, Term & re-version, Audit/accounting rights, Marketing & promotion budget, Moral-rights clause, and Rights for excerpts.
